title: Reveal three reward code buttons after gated final action

requirements.summary: Keep existing Yes/Yes gating, show a final action button labeled "Get Some Codes", and on click reveal exactly three code reward buttons with the specified labels.
acceptanceCriteria: If the user has not answered "Yes" to both questions, the "Get Some Codes" button is not visible.
If the user has answered "Yes" to both questions, the "Get Some Codes" button is visible.
Clicking "Get Some Codes" reveals exactly three buttons.
The three revealed buttonsâ€™ visible text matches exactly: "Sub2AcerXDucky = 4500 Money", "FunTrollTower6 = 3000 Money", and "ILoveTT6 = 1200 Money".
The three code buttons are not shown before clicking "Get Some Codes".

file_operations.description: Update the questionnaire-gated final action: (1) change the gated button label to exactly "Get Some Codes" and wire an onClick that toggles local UI state to reveal the code buttons; (2) render the three code buttons only after that click, with visible text matching exactly: "Sub2AcerXDucky = 4500 Money", "FunTrollTower6 = 3000 Money", "ILoveTT6 = 1200 Money"; (3) preserve current gating so neither the final action nor the code buttons are accessible unless both answers are "Yes"; (4) ensure the code buttons are hidden on initial questionnaire view and reset/rehide if answers change away from both "Yes". Use the existing shadcn-ui Button component for the final action and code buttons. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
